<%= @config[:title].encode(:xml => :text) %> <link rel="self" href="<%= @config.get_feed_permalink %>" /> <%= @articles.first.date_iso8601 %> <%= @config.get_feed_permalink %>
<% for @article in @articles %>
<%= @article.title.encode(:xml => :text) %> <link href="<%= @article.permalink %>" /> <category term="<%= @article.category %>" />
<%= @article.author.encode(:xml => :text) %>
<%= @article.permalink %> <%= @article.date_iso8601 %> <%= @article.summary.encode(:xml => :text) %>
<% if @config[:feed_show_full_article] %> <%= @article.body.encode(:xml => :text) %> <% end %>
<% end %>
